election_record.label: New Hampshire 1819 Governor

sub_unit.name: Fitzwilliam
sub_unit.note: The votes from Fitzwilliam were rejected.

sub_unit.name: Columbia
sub_unit.note: The votes from Columbia were rejected.

sub_unit.name: Coventry
sub_unit.note: The votes from Coventry were not included in the Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Deering
sub_unit.note: William M. Richardson received 16 votes as William Richardson.
The votes from Deering were rejected.

sub_unit.name: Portsmouth
sub_unit.note: Benjamin Pierce received 1 vote as Benjamin Pearce.

sub_unit.name: Center Harbor
sub_unit.note: The votes from Center Harbor were rejected because they did not "state that said votes were declared in open town meeting". Journal of the New Hampshire House of Representatives. 1819. 66.
